entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet tool install --roll-forward` is remembered across uninstall #44818
  • Wrong System.Text.Json dependency in dotnet-watch #44811

Closed

  • NETSDK1221 warning for wpftmp.csproj projects #44605
  • 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' runs too late, and defines are missing when 'XamlPreCompile' runs, causing build failures #43908
  • [VCPKG] Visual Studio Preview 5 v17.12 caused SDK Resolver Failure on Microsoft.Build.Vcpkg #44664
  • The .NET SDK Warning NETSDK1214 is inconsistant between .NET 9.0 and .NET 8.0.40x SDKs #44006

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Update triggers for SB sdk diff and license scan pipelines" (#43011) #44832
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #44830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove 6 from the branch codeflow #44829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build installers on Windows in aspnetcore. #44828
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.1xx #44827
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #44824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #44823
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #44821
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update Windows SDK projection #44807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert "[main] Update triggers for SB sdk diff and license scan pipelines (#43011) #44819
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #44825
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #44826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100 November 2024 Updates #44820
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' on 'BeforeCompile' #44695
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #44612
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [9.0.2xx] Avoid warning about empty NuGetPackageRoot in wpftmp projects #44688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2580625 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Remove the 9.0 template #44780
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44793
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dev 9611 #44676
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet-watch] Separate build from run #44699
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
